hadiths.text: This hadith has been narrated on the authority of Qatada with the same chain of transmitters but with this variation (of words):" When Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) came to Dhu'l-Hulaifa" and he made no mention (of the fact) that he led the Zuhr prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب تَقْلِيدِ الْهَدْىِ وَإِشْعَارِهِ عِنْدَ الإِحْرَامِ
chapter.eng-name: Marking and Garlanding the sacrificial animal when entering Ihram
